Uses of Class
glapp.GLImage

  • Packages that use GLImage 
    Package Description
    glapp  

    • Uses of GLImage in glapp

      Methods in glapp that return GLImage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GLImage GLApp.loadImage(java.lang.String imgFilename)
      Load an image from the given file and return a GLImage object.
      static GLImage GLApp.makeImage(int w, int h)
      Make a blank image of the given size.
      Methods in glapp with parameters of type GLImage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void GLApp.copyImageToTexture(GLImage img, int textureHandle)
      Calls glTexSubImage2D() to copy pixels from an image into a texture.
      static void GLApp.drawImage(GLImage img, int x, int y, float w, float h)
      Draw an image in whichever projection mode is current (does not switch to ortho mode).
      static void GLApp.drawImageFullScreen(GLImage img)
      Draw an image in ortho mode (2D) over the entire viewport area.
      static int GLApp.makeTexture(GLImage textureImg)
      Create a texture from the given image.
      static int GLApp.makeTextureMipMap(int textureHandle, GLImage textureImg)
      Build Mipmaps for currently bound texture (builds a set of textures at various levels of detail so that texture will scale up and down gracefully)
